ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] scope focus filter is not working
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, First I want to thank Mr.Gordon Mohr for the instant reply. I tried DecideRuleScope with following filters: 1) Accept all urls 2) URIRegExpFilter - if urls
